n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source:
<VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>STA_VW_TEACHER</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>FIRST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LAST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS2</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE_NUMBER1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE_NUMBER2</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>EMAIL</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PASSWORD</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COURSES</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>with courses_agg as( select listagg(distinct crse.name, ', ') within group ( order by crse.name) as courses , usr_id from sta_course_class_teacher crse_clss_tchr left join sta_course crse on crse_clss_tchr.crse_id = crse.id group by usr_id
), w_teacher as( select usr.id , usr.first_name , usr.last_name , usr.address1 , usr.address2 , usr.phone_number1 , usr.phone_number2 , usr.email , usr.password from sta_user usr join sta_user_role usr_rle on usr.id = usr_rle.usr_id join sta_role rle on usr_rle.rle_id = rle.id where lower(rle.name) = lower('teacher') and usr.deleted_flg = false ) select tchr."ID",tchr."FIRST_NAME",tchr."LAST_NAME",tchr."ADDRESS1",tchr."ADDRESS2",tchr."PHONE_NUMBER1",tchr."PHONE_NUMBER2",tchr."EMAIL",tchr."PASSWORD" , crse_agg.courses from w_teacher tchr left join courses_agg crse_agg on tchr.id = crse_agg.usr_id</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
